Played DW for the first time today. Afterward I bought the book and would like to DM some games. Anything you could point me to that would be helpful? <br />Thanks! 
<div id='comment z12ijhvznlyjfz53r235d1tzqoeehrtq504'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/116013665970125878211_photo.jpg'> Yochai Gal</h4>
      <p><cite>2017-07-21 01:59:36 (edited: 2017-07-21 01:59:36)</cite></p>
        <p>I made a syllabus for people just like you!<br /><a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ORjM3sxhQrwNI_chlNzYFMD5OFHj7u-Rs_gY4kHkzO0/edit?usp=drivesdk" data-embed="_-hF1aHR0cHM6Ly9kb2NzLmdvb2dsZS5jb20vZG9jdW1lbnQvZC8xT1JqTTNzeGhRcndOSV9jaGxOellGTUQ1T0ZIajd1LVJzX2dZNGtIa3pPMC9lZGl0P3VzcD1kcml2ZXNkayZfZXNjYXBlZF9mcmFnbWVudF89" data-attachment-render-hint="2" class="ot-anchor">https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ORjM3sxhQrwNI_chlNzYFMD5OFHj7u-Rs_gY4kHkzO0/edit?usp=drivesdk</a></p>

<div id='comment z12ijhvznlyjfz53r235d1tzqoeehrtq504'>

<div id='comment z12ijhvznlyjfz53r235d1tzqoeehrtq504'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/114709511984822898839_photo.jpg'> Erik Buchanan</h4>
      <p><cite>2017-07-21 10:19:09 (edited: 2017-07-21 10:19:09)</cite></p>
        <p>&quot;16 hit point dragon&quot; is a great example of how the relation between game mechanics versus narrative truths work in Dungeon World.</p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z12ijhvznlyjfz53r235d1tzqoeehrtq504'>

<div id='comment z12ijhvznlyjfz53r235d1tzqoeehrtq504'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/110301622772119888974_photo.jpg'> Andrew Huffaker</h4>
      <p><cite>2017-07-21 18:16:34 (edited: 2017-07-21 18:16:34)</cite></p>

I hate to sound like a self promoting blah blah blah, but I just wrote an article on a tool called the 5 room dungeon method, that fits. Not to put myself on the same level as everything else mentioned, but here is the link if you want to check out the article. <br /><br /><a href="https://thepsychologyofgaming.wordpress.com/" class="ot-anchor">https://thepsychologyofgaming.wordpress.com/</a></p>
</div>
